posts.post_content: @ResignedToFate: this won't happen. Prey Upon's effect is not combat, and combat damage is not dealt. Furthermore, trample damage won't be assigned to the other creature's owner, since trample only "works" during the combat.
posts.html:
@ResignedToFate: this won't happen. Prey Upon's effect is not combat, and combat damage is not dealt. Furthermore, trample damage won't be assigned to the other creature's owner, since trample only "works" during the combat.
